::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral growls at the breakout of violence. That really wasn't needed.

"Cease the fighting," he says to Motormaster, aiming his rifle at the 
bot. Behind him, Recklessa aimed her missile launcher at Motormaster.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaste clenches his fist at the interuption hardly able to 
contain his
> real mode like he was before. The joy ride wasnt enough for him to 
blow off
> steam. "Shut up" he yelled at the composer sending a fist towards 
the
> musical robots face.
